## IMetricsManager.getScrollMetrics() method

Returns the metrics for the scroll area of the workspace.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getScrollMetrics(opt_getWorkspaceCoordinates?: boolean, opt_viewMetrics?: ContainerRegion, opt_contentMetrics?: ContainerRegion): ContainerRegion;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  opt\_getWorkspaceCoordinates | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> True to get the scroll metrics in workspace coordinates, false to get them in pixel coordinates. |
|  opt\_viewMetrics | ContainerRegion | <i>(Optional)</i> The view metrics if they have been previously computed. Passing in null may cause the view metrics to be computed again, if it is needed. |
|  opt\_contentMetrics | ContainerRegion | <i>(Optional)</i> The content metrics if they have been previously computed. Passing in null may cause the content metrics to be computed again, if it is needed. |

<b>Returns:</b>

ContainerRegion

The metrics for the scroll container
